root.name: Cubic Ninja
root.description: PlotThe game follows "CC" (a cube shaped ninja) on his journey to save his friends.GameplayPlayers guide CC through 100 levels, most of which operate on two to three panes. Stages are cleared by activating switches, avoiding hazards, and defeating occasional enemies. A the end of each of the game's 5 stages, players battle a boss, using environmental features to harm the enemy. A new character is unlocked after each boss confrontation.Characters move using either the 3DS' gyroscopic controls, or using the system's circle pad. Each character controls using different physics.
